name: Ingrown Toenail Removal
description:
*** RANKED #1 EDUCATIONAL GAME IN 2 COUNTRIES ***

Surgery Squad’s Virtual Ingrown Toenail Removal

Take on the role of a Virtual Surgeon – You are in control as you perform virtual ingrown toenail removal surgery. Inject, Cut, Yank and Bandage your way to optimum toe health in this highly interactive educational game!

FEATURES:
* Highly interactive virtual surgery
* Informative introduction on the causes of ingrown toenails.
* Interactive procedure including anesthesia, cutting the toenail, removing the toenail and bandaging!
* Recovery tips
* Great for kids & adults
